title: The Lodger
description: The doll's house will only be sold to the right girl...At a local yard sale, the Gallagher family encounters Beatrix, an elderly woman selling a charming doll's house, which instantly captivates eight-year-old Charlotte Gallagher. After some initial hesitation, Beatrix agrees to sell the doll's house to Charlotte, prompting her parents, Pat and Christina, to make the purchase. However, their joy turns to dismay when they discover that Beatrix is selling her daughter's childhood doll's house due to her homelessness. Moved by her situation, the Gallaghers offer her a room in their spacious home, becoming her unlikely benefactors. Little did the Gallaghers know, this simple act of kindness would lead to a whirlpool of unexpected events that would change their lives forever.
author: Jonathan  Dunne
